name: Disarranged
description:
Disarranged

John is depressed. His thoughts are disarranged. How long can he keep this up? Will the depression ever leave him? How will his life take shape? Can he find joy in his life again? But maybe the most important question, who's messing with his stuff

- CONTROLS -
Z, X and C
or J, K, L
or Q, W, E
or A, S, D


F4 to Fullscreen (Only in menu)


Ludum Dare Page


- CREDITS -
Programmer: Daniël Haazen (Sheepolution)
Artist: Sander Heijnen (Mojosaman)
